go_data.justification: p27 is part of the pointed-end complex, which contains predicted cargo-binding motifs.
p27 is associated with the Arp1 minifilament in the dynactin pointed-end complex.
p27 is part of the dynactin complex, which is involved in cytoplasmic dynein-mediated transport.
p27 is part of the pointed-end complex, which assembles with other subunits to form a functional complex.
